text: Mbe fhura kav garim, Zudaiŋ hegap, Areksander bɨrgim, ana vov mba gumgi gu mbigi nɨman thɨgi. Ana vov thɨgim, mba gumgi gu mbigi ana garav, kha ndɨkndɨgar ana mbui, ana mba simtɨga bakɨme khavgi guma ma. Areksander mba gumgi gu mbigi nɨma thɨgap, mbe buni ŋgarka zav, farvera mbe khakhaigi, mbe thɨɨri pɨngirim, ana mbe suanga. 19.33 Mbe kha fhain tuituigiap Grikin kama kaŋgi fhuvara.
